verses.roman:
haridāsa yabe nija-gṛha tyāga kailā
benāpolera vana-madhye kata-dina rahilā

synonyms: haridāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; yabe—when; nija-gṛha—his own residence; tyāga kailā—gave up; benāpolera—of the village known as Benāpola; vana-madhye—in the forest; kata-dina—for some time; rahilā—stayed.
translation: After leaving his home, Haridāsa Ṭhākura stayed for some time in the forest of Benāpola.
